data.eml:eml: Cochlostoma revised: the subgenus Lovcenia Zallot et al., 2015 (Caenogastropoda, Cochlostomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zallot, Enrico, Fehér, Zoltán, Bamberger, Sonja, Gittenberger, Edmund (2018): Cochlostoma revised: the subgenus Lovcenia Zallot et al., 2015 (Caenogastropoda, Cochlostomatidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 464: 1-25, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.464
